about.me: As a Systems Engineers team, we strongly believe in Cardano Project. Anyone can join us. We have adopted a continuous improvement approach for you. Pledge will be increasing monthly. Systems are going to be improved continuously. Let's grow together!!!.
about.server: We have our servers in Toronto. All our infrastructure is Cloud based so we offer high availability and we can easily scale at more servers if we consider necessary.
about.company: As a company we aim to evolve as the cardano project grows. Our goal in the future is continue having the staking pool, with greater pledge and lots of delegators
